product.title: Because A Little Bug Went Ka-CHOO! | Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Because a Little Bug Went Ka-CHOO!
by Rosetta Stone

What could happen when a little bug sneezes? In the story Because a Little Bug Went Ka-CHOO!, the hilarious consequences are brought to life with the lyrical rhymes of Rosetta Stone (aka Dr. Seuss writing with Michael Frith). Written with just 120 words, this simple tale of cause-and-effect shows even the youngest readers how actions impact others.

Tie-in Activity: As you read the story, ask your child to guess what will happen next. Or play a cause-and-effect game with your baby, such as stacking blocks and then knocking them down while you say, “Ka-CHOO!”
